reviews.text: Stayed here as part of a tour around Sicily in June/July 2007.
reviews.title: Just like a holiday camp.......

likes.disliked: — The restaurant service and overall location

reviews.text: Arenella Resort is a large complex. Over 460 rooms, so don't expect small and friendly. It is situated quite a way out of Syracuse - most travel sites say 11kms but it seems a bit more than this. There is a bus service from the hotel to town but we didn't use it as we had a hire car.
reviews.title: What a lovely place and lovely people

likes.liked: — Friendly staff plus at dinner time you get unlimited amount of wine and water.
likes.disliked: — It's far away from any shops.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check-in was okay but staff were a bit officious. The resort relies on non-All Inclusive guests using a pre-paid card system for buying drinks, snacks etc. You top up the card with a minimum of €5 to start and you can add to this as you go along. Bar staff debit the card as you buy. Any unused amount is paid back to you at the end of your stay. For some reason they will only accept cash to top up the card - couldn't use credit cards etc. Given the location of the Arenella resort, they could exploit guests by over-charging for drinks and snacks but they don't. Everything is reasonably priced.
reviews.title: A very nice area, hotel staff not adequate.
